lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Patrick Stump/Pete Wentz/Joe Trohman/Andy Hurley
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Patrick Stump/Pete Wentz/Joe Trohman/Andy Hurley
[00:10.61]When they say you and what army
[00:14.79]I guess they're talking about you and me
[00:19.33]Baby nobody will love you
[00:22.95]Nobody will love you like like I do
[00:27.97]I guess that's half true
[00:30.41]Come down come down
[00:32.86]Come down from your holy mountain
[00:35.17]I'm down I'm down
[00:36.95]So put your shame on a billboard for a second
[00:39.87]Sometimes sometimes
[00:41.76]The only way out is through
[00:46.63]Through
[00:48.56]'Cause everyone loves Bob Dylan
[00:51.91]I just want you to love me like that yeah
[00:58.22]Would you bury me next to Johnny Cash I'm obsessed
[01:02.76]Do you love me like that yeah
[01:18.08]So what fates do we share
[01:22.12]Windows down wind in your hair
[01:26.46]Baby no one ever thinks of you
[01:30.04]No one ever thinks of you as much as I do
[01:35.22]Not not even you
[01:37.58]Come down come down
[01:40.00]Come down from your holy mountain
[01:42.38]I'm down I'm down
[01:44.12]So put your shame on a billboard for a second
[01:47.09]Sometimes sometimes
[01:48.99]The only way out is through
[01:53.80]Through
[01:55.85]'Cause everyone loves Bob Dylan
[01:59.17]I just want you to love me like that yeah
[02:05.49]Would you bury me next to Johnny Cash
[02:08.75]I'm obsessed
[02:09.99]Do you love me like that yeah
[02:25.53]Woah oh oh oh oh
[02:30.11]Woah oh oh oh oh
[02:39.04]'Cause everyone loves Bob Dylan
[02:42.41]I just want you to love me like that yeah
[02:48.57]Would you bury me next to Johnny Cash
[02:52.01]I'm obsessed
[02:53.25]Do you love me like that yeah
tlyric:
[by:兔兔辣么可爱一定要多放孜然]
[00:10.61]当他们说起你在哪个阵营
[00:14.79]我猜那肯定说的是你我
[00:19.33]宝贝儿没人会那么爱你了
[00:22.95]没人会像我一样那样爱你了
[00:27.97]我猜说对了一半吧
[00:30.41]下落吧，坠入吧
[00:32.86]从你的神圣山林里坠入人间
[00:35.17]我在下沉啊，在下沉啊
[00:36.95]所以对那公告牌排行还是带点羞愧
[00:39.87]有时，有时吧
[00:41.76]这是唯一的出路
[00:46.63]出路
[00:48.56]人人都爱Bob Dylan
[00:51.91]我就希望你爱我就像喜欢他那样~
[00:58.22]能帮个忙把我贴着Johnny cash（Bob Dylan的好友）边儿上埋了吗？我很喜欢他
[01:02.76]你能像那样喜欢我吗
[01:18.08]所以说，我们共享了一个什么样的命运？
[01:22.12]车窗摇下，风吹散你的秀发
[01:26.46]宝贝儿没人会那样了解你了
[01:30.04]没人会像我那么透彻地了解你
[01:35.22]包括你自己
[01:37.58]下落吧，坠入吧
[01:40.00]从你的神圣山林里坠入人间
[01:42.38]我在下沉啊，在下沉啊
[01:44.12]所以对那公告牌排行还是带点羞愧
[01:47.09]有时，有时吧
[01:48.99]这是唯一的出路
[01:53.80]出路
[01:55.85]人人都爱Bob Dylan
[01:59.17]我希望你能像那样爱我
[02:05.49]可以把我埋在Johnny Cash旁边吗
[02:08.75]我很喜欢他
[02:09.99]你能像那样喜欢我吗
[02:25.53]
[02:30.11]
[02:39.04]人人都爱Bob Dylan
[02:42.41]我就希望你爱我就像喜欢他那样

[02:52.01]我很喜欢他
